body.name: Portable Gel Seat Cushion Foldable Gel Car Seat Cushion, Thick Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting Pressure Relief for Office Chair Car Stadium Airplane Travel, Sciatica, Tailbone Pain Relief
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 52 mins
features: GEL PRESSURE RELIEF CUSHION FOR LONG SITTING: The comfort gel seat cushion is designed with a honeycomb grid structure to dynamically release pressure points, providing maximum support and comfort while relieving pressure, dispersing hip pressure and maintaining hip curves, Allows you to sit for long periods without feeling tired. Helps relieve sciatica symptoms and improves blood circulation. Provides extra comfort to any chair, seat, bench or stadium seat.

COMFORTABLE & BREATHABLE: The portable seat cushion adopts a double-sided structure design, the texture is safe and does not deform, and has built-in free-flowing air channels to increase airflow, prevent stuffiness, maintain comfort, and bring ultimate coolness and comfort. Highly elastic gel always maintains its original shape without losing support, cracking and collapsing.

PORTABLE: The gel chair cushion adopts a foldable design to save space and is equipped with a handle for easy portability. It can also be carried in a handbag, backpack or luggage. The office chair seat cushion comes with a removable cover and is machine washable. You can take it to the stadium, office, plane, car, bus, train, other rooms, etc.

REMOVABLE ANTI-SLIP COVER: The extra large seat cushion comes with a removable cloth cover with silicone anti-slip particles on the bottom to prevent it from moving from the seat. The cloth cover is hand and machine washable for easy cleaning.

WIDELY USED: The gel pressure relief cushion has the characteristics of portability, durability, comfort and breathability, and is very suitable as office chair seat cushion, airplane seat cushion, travel seat cushion, stadium seat cushion, wheelchair seat cushion, garden chair cushions . As a gift for sedentary people, they will be very surprised and touched by your thoughtfulness
body.description: Feature：🦽Highly elastic gel always maintains its original shape without losing support, cracking and collapsing.🚗Dynamically releases pressure points to provide maximum support and comfort while relieving pressure, dispersing hip pressure and maintaining hip curves, allowing you to sit for long periods of time without feeling tired.✈️ Helps relieve sciatica symptoms and improves blood circulation.👩‍💼 The gel chair cushion adopts a foldable design to save space and is equipped with a handle for easy portability.🪑 The texture is safe and does not deform, and has built-in free-flowing air channels to increase airflow, prevent stuffiness, maintain comfort, and bring ultimate coolness and comfort.💺 Provides extra comfort to any chair, seat, bench or stadium seat.🏟️ Comes with a removable non-slip cloth cover that is machine and hand washable.🚌 Portable, durable, comfortable and breathable.Specification:Colour: BlackMaterial: cloth + gelSize: 10.2*20.5 inchesPackage includes: 1*Portable Gel Seat Cushion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased because my last trip to Vietnam my butt hurt on the 16 hour and then 7 hour flight. I was having to fold up the blanket they pass out and sit on it. Flying again to Vietnam so purchased this. No need to even test on flights before reviewing. I know this fixes the issue. Im 5ft 10 and 155 lbs and I do not have to unfold to sit on. So it is double cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, but,
reviews.reviewText: This is quite comfortable and should make a big difference on overseas flights. But it's heavier than I expected. I would still have ordered it even if I had thought to look at the weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thickness of product
reviews.reviewText: This product is good, however needs to be a little more sturdy or a little thicker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So useful- just not as thick as its predecessor
reviews.reviewText: Predecessor was stolen so this is permanently stashed in my car. Great for relief on long drives but using it for football games (much warmer and softer than sitting on the bleachers) and works the same way for taking my elderly mom out in her wheelchair.Convenient to use and carry. Sturdy materials and provides a supportive cushion. Budget friendly and very versatile and useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No doubt this will save your rump from going numb.
reviews.reviewText: It's pretty big, so you don't have to be precisely over the drop zone to land cleanly on the pad. It's very spongy but firm enough you will not find a hard spot, or one that is cold in winter or hot in summer. Now, I know you probably got by with a piece of foam to sit on. This is much better than that. A piece of foam doesn't give you much cushion. This is ample cushion. Unlike foam, it weighs a lot more so you're going to be hoofing the cushion and a cooler and whatnot so be mindful of that weight. Overall, this is a really nice rump saver and worth the coin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This gives a welcome added padding to my chair
reviews.reviewText: I got this for padding on the picnic table bench when camping and picnicking.I spend a lot of time at my desk and have been using this pad to ease my "butt fatigue" which is an unexpected bonus! This pad is now part of my daily life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, thick and cushy
reviews.reviewText: My first gel cushion so I don't have a frame of reference but I am definitely happy with this one. It is much thicker than I anticipated and very well constructed. Portable. Can be used alone or I plan to use it in my super cheap basic lawn chair to add some padding and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Seat cushion is comfortable and adds height to your seat so you need to adjust mirrors and such for driving.
